name: Edward Witten
alma_mater: Brandeis University (B.A.) ,  University of Wisconsin-Madison ,  Princeton University (PhD)
doctoral_students: Cumrun Vafa   Xiao-Gang Wen   Eva Silverstein   Shamit Kachru   Sergei Gukov
known_for: String theory   M-theory   Quantum Gravity  Quantum Field Theory Supersymmetry
prizes: MacArthur Fellowship (1982)   Dirac Medal (1985)   Albert Einstein Award (1985)   Fields Medal (1990) Henri Poincaré Prize (2006) Crafoord Prize (2008) Lorentz Medal (2010) Isaac Newton Medal (2010)
